Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine that can be of two types: Regular or Special. It manages the money, inventory, and functionality of the vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • createVendingMachine

      public void createVendingMachine(String name, String type, HashMap<Ingredient,Integer> slots) throws InterruptedException
      Creates a vending machine with the specified name, type, and inventory slots.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the vending machine
      type - the type of the vending machine ("Regular" or "Special")
      slots - the inventory slots of the vending machine
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping

    • testVendingMachine

      public void testVendingMachine() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the functionality of the vending machine.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping

    • dispenseChange

      public Map<Integer,Integer> dispenseChange(int amountPaid, int amountToPay)
      Dispenses the change to the user based on the amount paid and the amount to be paid.
      Parameters:
      amountPaid - the amount paid by the user
      amountToPay - the amount to be paid for the item
      Returns:
      a map representing the denominations and quantities of the change to be dispensed, or null if change cannot be made

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Exits the program with a status code of 0.
